title: Sveltekit crashes in iOS 14
body:
### Describe the bug

The latest version of SvelteKit crashes in iOS 14. This was not an issue in 1.0.0-next.405.

When client-side navigating, the app crashes and completely stops responding.

This is the error in the console:

```
client.js:919 Unhandled Promise Rejection: TypeError: navigation_result.state.branch.at is not a function. (In 'navigation_result.state.branch.at(-1)', 'navigation_result.state.branch.at' is undefined)
```

In production, the code shows up in the start.js file where the array function .at() is used.

This function is not supported in iOS 14 and only has 88% browser support according to caniuse: https://caniuse.com/mdn-javascript_builtins_array_at

### Reproduction

Open a site running the latest version of SvelteKit in iOS14. I used Browserstack for this.

### Logs

```shell
Unhandled Promise Rejection: TypeError: navigation_result.state.branch.at is not a function. (In 'navigation_result.state.branch.at(-1)', 'navigation_result.state.branch.at' is undefined)
(anonymous) @ client.js:919
asyncFunctionResume @ [native code]:1
(anonymous) @ [native code]:1
promiseReactionJobWithoutPromise @ [native code]:1
promiseReactionJob @ [native code]:1
```


### System Info

```shell
System:
    OS: Windows 10 10.0.22000
    CPU: (32) x64 AMD Ryzen 9 5950X 16-Core Processor
    Memory: 46.01 GB / 63.91 GB
  Binaries:
    Node: 16.16.0 - C:\Program Files\nodejs\node.EXE
    npm: 8.11.0 - C:\Program Files\nodejs\npm.CMD
  Browsers:
    Edge: Spartan (44.22000.120.0), Chromium (104.0.1293.54)
    Internet Explorer: 11.0.22000.120
  npmPackages:
    @sveltejs/adapter-auto: 1.0.0-next.64 => 1.0.0-next.64
    @sveltejs/kit: 1.0.0-next.424 => 1.0.0-next.424
    svelte: ^3.49.0 => 3.49.0
    vite: ^3.0.9 => 3.0.9
```


### Severity

blocking an upgrade

### Additional Information

_No response_
